entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets changing to flurries at times heavy this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
